item.title: CVE-2023-3377|2023-11-23T08:30:25.283Z -- veribilim%20software%20computer -- veribase
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Veribilim Software Computer Veribase allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Veribase: through 20231123.Â
NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
